Articles.Content:
I was trying to replace the countless turbojets on a heavier MK3 plane with a pair or two of ones tweakscaled a number upwards. And while they'd suffice, everything falls apart. The plane breaks into multiple pieces first thing after leaving the runway, often even before that.

Most interestingly, first to go are parts that have no business breaking apart, e.g. the cockpit breaks away from the hull, even though the whiplashes are attached to wings.

Is this some bug or am I doing something wrong?

A pic would help, one in the spaceplane hangar, and one of your f3 tab.

There is a chance that if it is a heavy plane, al the weight is going onto a nosegear as the craft is loading in.

Thats all,

JT
Mk3 parts are really weak. They can't really handle very big planes.
